metadata.title: Voyage Japan with Asuka III | Premium Japanese Cruise Experience
metadata.description: Discover Japan's coastlines aboard Asuka III, Japan's most prestigious cruise ship. Experience world-class hospitality, exquisite cuisine, and unforgettable destinations.

hero.headline: Discover Japan by Sea
hero.subheadline: Experience the extraordinary aboard Asuka III, Japan's most prestigious cruise ship

brandStory.title: Why Asuka III
brandStory.subtitle: A Legacy of Excellence
brandStory.paragraph1: For over three decades, the Asuka name has symbolized the pinnacle of Japanese hospitality at sea. Asuka III continues this proud tradition, offering an unparalleled voyage experience that seamlessly blends Western luxury with Japanese refinement.
brandStory.paragraph2: Every journey aboard Asuka III is crafted to reveal Japan's hidden treasures—from remote islands to historic ports—while enveloping you in world-class comfort and service.

callToAction.title: Begin Your Voyage
callToAction.subtitle: Let us help you plan an unforgettable journey through Japan's most captivating destinations

cruises.pageSubtitle: Explore Japan's diverse coastlines, from the subtropical islands of Okinawa to the rugged beauty of Hokkaido

cruiseDetail.priceNote: Prices shown are per person for two guests sharing one room. Single occupancy will incur an additional surcharge. Port charges and taxes included.
cruiseDetail.exchangeRateNote: Prices are approximate USD equivalents at ¥130 = $1. Actual prices are in Japanese Yen and subject to exchange rate fluctuations.

ship.pageSubtitle: Asuka III represents the finest in Japanese maritime hospitality

overview.title: A Masterpiece of Maritime Design
overview.description: Asuka III embodies the perfect harmony of Japanese aesthetics and modern luxury. Every detail, from the elegant public spaces to the meticulously appointed staterooms, reflects our commitment to providing an unparalleled cruise experience.

cabins.title: Accommodations
cabins.subtitle: Nine distinctive cabin types, each offering exceptional comfort

dining.title: Culinary Excellence
dining.subtitle: Six distinctive restaurants showcasing world-class cuisine
dining.barsSubtitle: Refined spaces for relaxation, conversation, and evening entertainment

contact.pageSubtitle: Our travel consultants are ready to help you create your perfect Asuka III experience

form.title: Inquiry Form
form.name: Full Name
